discussion.p: says that __cpp_lib_polymorphic_allocator is also defined in <memory>, but std::polymorphic_allocator is defined in <memory_resource>. This seems like an error in P1902R1. The macro should be in the same header as the feature it relates to.
Set status to Tentatively Ready after six votes in favour during reflector discussions.

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N4861.
